turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I might order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want four large pizzas all of them with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, did you just want cheese for all 4 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I want other things for the pizzas. I just wanted to make sure all of them had extra.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one with supreme, two with pepperoni sausage and onions and one veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 large pizzas with extra cheese, 1 supreme, 1 veggie lovers, 2 with pepperoni, sausage and onions, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $100, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick up or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. No, that's all I needed.
